mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GRADE_TBL WHERE STUDENT_NO = #{studentNo} AND GRADE_YEAR = #{year} AND GRADE_SESSION = #{season}
SELECT DISTINCT G.GRADE_SUBJECT, L.LECTURE_NO FROM LECTURE_TBL L JOIN GRADE_TBL G ON (L.LECTURE_NO = G.LECTURE_NO AND G.PROFESSOR_NO = #{professorNo})

SELECT * FROM GRADE_TBL G JOIN STUDENT_TBL S ON S.STUDENT_NO = G.STUDENT_NO LEFT JOIN ATTENDANCE_TBL A ON A.STUDENT_NO = S.STUDENT_NO WHERE G.PROFESSOR_NO=#{professorNo} AND GRADE_SUBJECT = #{lectureName} ORDER BY G.STUDENT_NO, S.STUDENT_NAME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE_TBL VALUES(#{studentNo}, #{lectureNo}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{attStatus},'N', #{lectureName}, #{studentName}, SEQ_ATT_NO.NEXTVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ATTENDANCE_TBL WHERE STUDENT_NO = #{studentNo} AND LECTURE_NAME = #{lectureName}
SELECT * FROM ATTENDANCE_TBL A JOIN GRADE_TBL P ON (P.LECTURE_NO = A.LECTURE_NO AND P.PROFESSOR_NO = #{professorNo} AND ATT_OBJECTION = 'Y' ) ORDER BY A.LECTURE_NAME, ATT_STUDENT_NAME
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDANCE_TBL SET ATT_OBJECTION = 'Y' WHERE ATT_NO = #{attNo}
UPDATE ATTENDANCE_TBL SET ATT_STATUS = #{attStatus} WHERE LECTURE_NO = #{lectureNo} AND STUDENT_NO = #{studentNo}
